attributes.action: We want a stop  to knife crime and drugs in our town today
attributes.additional_details:
Dear sir or madam.

We the peaple of both clacton on sea essex and jaywick sands would like something done about the lack of police on our streets.
There has been a rise in knife crime and drugs are out of control in the area to.
The peaple of clacton are and jaywick are now living in fear and no longer want to live in this area.
Its time this was ended and the seaside town made safe again.
The cctv in both jaywick and clacton are never moving so who is watching all this.
Also peaple get told its not recording.

Its time the peaple of clacton on sea and jaywick sands was seen as humans not push overs.
Many ppl who visit for holiday say they will never come again and spend there money.is this what tendering want ..

Something needs doing for not just us but for our kids..

rejection.details: This is a police operational matter.
